      • attachFragment

        protected final void attachFragment(FragmentAttachmentDetails attachmentDetails)
        First looks for an existing Fragment and if it exists, attaches that to this Activity. If one is not found, calls attachNewFragment to attach a new Fragment.
        Parameters:
        attachmentDetails - the details of the fragment to attach

      • fragmentsResumed

        public final boolean fragmentsResumed()
        Returns:
        whether the fragments have been resumed or not

        Returns a fragment at a given position.
        Parameters:
        position - the position the fragment is attached at
        Returns:
        the found fragment

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the found fragment

      • subscribe

        protected <T> void subscribe(rx.Observable<T> observable,
                             rx.Subscriber<T> subscriber)
        Subscribes to observable with subscriber, retaining the resulting Subscription so when the Activity is destroyed the Observable can be unsubscribed from.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type the Observable is observing
        Parameters:
        observable - the Observable to subscribe to
        subscriber - the Subscriber to subscribe with
